name: ELFAT (Elchemy) - Oleic Acid
description: ELFAT (Elchemy) supplies Oleic Acid, a monounsaturated fatty acid naturally found in olive and canola oils. Oleic acid functions as a penetration enhancer and emollient in barrier repair formulations. Suitable for cosmetics, cooking, and industrial applications. Provides moisturization and helps improve the absorption of other active ingredients.
notes: Monounsaturated fatty acid found naturally in olive and canola oils. Functions as penetration enhancer, helping other actives absorb into skin. Provides emollient properties and moisturization. Suitable for multiple applications including cosmetics and industrial uses.
